metadata.name: Indicator Measure
metadata.description: To specify how an indicator is being measured. This includes qualitative and quantitative values.

codelist-item.name: Unit
Unité
codelist-item.description: The indicator is measured in units.
L'indicateur est mesuré à l'aide d'unités.

codelist-item.name: Percentage
Pourcentage
codelist-item.description: The indicator is measured in percentages

codelist-item.name: Nominal
Nominal
codelist-item.description: The indicator is measured as a quantitative nominal scale.
L'indicateur est mesuré selon une échelle nominale quantitative.

codelist-item.name: Ordinal
Ordinal
codelist-item.description: The indicator is measured as a quantitative ordinal scale.
L'indicateur est mesurée selon une échelle ordinale quantitative.
